node.name: Classic Creative Brick MAKE: LEGO
node.description: Lego bricks encourage open-ended building play, and inspire imagination. Lot of wheels add to the fun and offers endless possibilities for creative construction and vehicle play. Comes in a convenient plastic storage box and includes idea book to get the building started. (CONTAINER SIZE: 370x180x180mm / NUMBER OF PIECES: 484 / NUMBER OF COLOURS: 35)
node.content: Lego originally from Denmark making recreational toy since 1930 and many parents do have experience with it / With 484 pieces in 35 colours, children can draw any form of imagination / Children loves to play with movable toys and therefore 18 tires and 18 wheel rims are provided to make toy cars / Some special pieces like baseplate, window & eyes are also provided in addition so that originality could be copied in some extent / Parents can teach their growing kids many things with the Legos like creativity, management and top of that the art of assembling things / As per survey Legos considered to be most creative game because it activate the frontal cortex / Legos can be played by both girl and boy and it is most recommended toy by pediatricians.
node.alt: Lego Classic Creative Brick Multi Color 484 pcs

node.name: Trampoline MAKE: First Play
node.description: Rust resistant metal frame with waterproof PVC padding, portable and can be used indoor or outdoor. Edge protection brings more safety and comfort to sport, also exercise trampoline is really good at space saving and suitable for variety of people. (FOR: 2-10 year / SIZE: 1400mm Dia / MATERIAL: Alloy Steel / CARRY WEIGHT: 100 Kg)
node.content: This trampoline is built with heavy duty steel frame and base to prevent from tipping over and galvanized springs for long lasting play which could be used for more than 5 years without rust or out of shape / Smooth design between the enclosure and the mat, eliminates gaps and protect children from pinch points & openings / Durable and comfortable, absorbs 80% of the impact when children lands on it which means that they can play as long as they want without stressing or damaging ankles, knees or hips / Breathable mat and protective pad provides a more comfortable bouncing experience / Use for purpose like fitness workout or aerobic workout that improve strength, coordination and balance.
node.alt: first Play 55 inch 4.5 Feet Kids Trampoline with Safety Enclosure Net & Spring Pad  Indoor & Outdoor Trampoline  Exercise Trampoline for Kids & Adults  100KG Powerful Loading Capacity

node.name: Toy Gaming Computer MAKE: ESNIPE MART
node.description: Shape exactly like a real laptop, LCD Screen with a full-fledged keyboard and mouse as well. Includes onboard help for spelling, pronunciation and also games to create entertainment environment after study. Waterproof joints and screen locking system like a real laptop. (FOR: 2-6 year / SIZE: 300x260x50mm / WEIGHT: 690 grams)
node.content: Complete set of basic guidance regarding number and alphabet which generally taught at pre-school / With 'Caps Lock' function this toy computer act like the real one and child can write in capital & small letters / Spelling and pronunciation module is also set so that child can correct its mistake, around 10000 words are installed which are commonly used in English / For entertainment 50 musical notes or melodies are stored / LCD screen of 50x50mm display the things in fine quality / Designed for young child so that they can self-taught the basic lessons / Powered with 3 numbers of 1.5V AA battery that can give the back up of 2 months at healthy use of 3 hours every day.
node.alt: esnipe mart 20 activities & games fun laptop notebook computer toy for kidsBlue

node.name: Toy Slide MAKE: BABYGO
node.description: Sliding promote tactile sensing, coordination ability and improve balanced capacity. Made of durable and non-toxic PE material which is secure for babies slide. Multi colour design attracts babies and gentle slope with easy-to-climb steps make smooth playground for 3-year-old babies. (FOR: 1-4 year / SIZE: 1150x395x240mm / WEIGHT: 6.5 Kg)
node.content: Constructed of durable, non-toxic plastic to ensure safety when in use and is ideal for both indoor & outdoor / Folds and unfolds in seconds, develop essential balance and coordination skills while climbing and gliding in slide / No tools is required to assemble the slide, also no sharp edges is provided to avoid any kind of wound / Height of the slide is restricted to 3 feet and up to 25 Kg it can withstand the weight / Children prefer to play on slide more than marry-go-round or see-saw and foldable mechanism also consumes less space, maybe thatâ€™s why it is purchased by pre-school as well / One of the appreciated buying gift for children below 6 year.
node.alt: BabyGo Nara Toy Slide for Kids at Home and School 140 cm  80 cm  60cm Foldable
